renderpass.code:
#define S(v)  smoothstep(2./R.y,0., v)

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy;
    U /= R;

    float p = 15., // choose carefully: largest that doesn't cause overflow
         x1 = U.x, x2 = U.x + iTime/6.,
#if 0    // better for testing max possible p (artifacts near y=0 ).
         v0 = .5+.5*cos(6.28*x1),
         v1 = .5+.5*cos(6.28*x2),
#else
         v0 = .5+.3*cos(6.28*x1)     + .2*sin(6.28*x1*2.7),
         v1 = .5+.2*cos(6.28*x2*1.3) - .3*sin(6.28*x2*3.1),
#endif
          m = pow( pow(v0,-p) + pow(v1,-p), -1./p), // approx min
          M = pow( pow(v0, p) + pow(v1, p),  1./p); // approx Max
         // quite like to_sRGB( Sum_i{ from_sRGB( C[i] ) } )
    
    O = S( U.y- vec4(m,M,0,0) );                    // draw yellow:pseudo-min, green:pseudo-max
    
    O = mix( O, vec4(1,0,0,0), S( abs(U.y-v0) ) );  // draw curves
    O = mix( O, vec4(1,0,0,0), S( abs(U.y-v1) ) );
}
